column4: care to give step-by-step instructions for that? I could use that, actually

Uh you can temporarily add the ask thing by doing edits at the grub menu, except you'll probably have to do ita few times to get a good resolution.  So, for both steps (ask and the eventual real resoltuion), edit /boot/grub/menu.lst, and on the kopt= line (yes, it's commented out, no you don't uncomment it) add vga=ask to the end.  And then save, and then sudo update-grub to regen sources.list
